description: Triangle, read by antidiagonals, where T(n,k) = C(n+n*k+k, n*k+k).
comments: Main diagonal is A108288. Antidiagonal sums is A108289. Inverse binomial transforms of each row give triangle A108290. G.f. of row n multiplied by (1-x)^(n+1) equals g.f. of row n of triangle A108267 (rows sums of A108267 equal (n+1)^n).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..252
prog: (PARI) T(n,k)=binomial(n+n*k+k,n*k+k)(PARI) { i=0; write("b060543.txt", "0 1"); for (m=0, 20, for (k=0, m + 1, n=m - k + 1; write("b060543.txt", i++, " ", binomial(n + n*k + k, n*k + k))); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 06 2009
crossrefs: Rows include A000012, A001700, A025174. Columns include A000012, A005408, A060544. Main diagonal is A060545.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 02 2001
extensions: Entry revised by _Paul D. Hanna_, May 31 2005
Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_ at the suggestion of _Andrew Plewe_, Jun 17 2007
